title: organization
description: Schema for an organizational ruleset in MDF.

canonical_name.description: The canonical name of the organization, to be displayed in the 'organization' field.

alias_names.description: Non-canonical names for the organization that should be accepted.

permission_groups.description: UUIDs of Globus Groups. Members, managers, and admins of the group(s) will be given permissions within this organization in MDF.

data_storage.description: Globus links to mandatory data backup locations.

curation.description: Whether or not curation should be forced for all datasets in this organization.

project_block.description: The special project blocks associated with this organization's metadata.

required_fields.description: Fields or blocks that are required for an organizational dataset to be valid, using dot syntax.

parent_organizations.descriptions: The organization(s) that are direct parents to this one.

items.description: The name of one parent organization.

integrations.description: The services and other integrations all organizational datasets should be submitted to.
